apps.localizedDescription: StikNES is a SwiftUI-based NES emulator designed for iOS devices. It leverages the power of SwiftUI to deliver a clean, modern interface while emulating the classic NES gaming experience using the nes-rust library.
apps.name: StikNES
apps.subtitle: SwiftUI NES Emulator for iOS
apps.versionDescription:
Fix B button functionality to improve gameplay accuracy.
 Add controller support for a more authentic gaming experience.
 Perform extensive testing to ensure stability and reliability.
